comments.body: I've noticed the image picker shows kernels and ramdisks. It should be limited to machine images only.

Please be sure you check the Notes area on the wireframe for details. Wireframe at https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Launch+instance+wizard+-+refreshed

* When on Image tab, we can't see the rest of the tabs (user doesn't know how many steps are involved)
* now that the descriptions are not co-located with the step name like they were, but are on the panel body itself, I updated them to be less fragmented. Please check the wireframe and update them to match. 
* image page: label here should not have colon if other labels do not have colons (I think they have colons int he wireframes but in the rest of the console implementation they do not, so they should no here to be consistent)
* image page, GO button should say "Next"
* image page includes EKIs and ERIs but should only show EMIs.
* image page: we cannot use an icon for windows images because MS are b-holes about licensing. Please no icon for those. 
Image page: we have an icon to display when we only know it's linux and we don't know what flavor, and also one for when we don't know WTF. Please use those (Do we need to have those redrawn in vector by new vis designer? Please let me know)
* image page: be sure filters get implemented here like on the landing page, they are really important in this context)
*image page: don't need image count if you need room
* summary area does not match wireframe, shows extra stuff you don't really need, please stack labels there
*type step should be named "Details" (I changed that when we changed the wizard layout, sorry)
* type page: names label should be "Name(s)"
* type page: AZ selector default should be "No preference"
* type page: vm type combobox is not wide enough to display all vm type properties when not expanded
* type page: Next button should just say "Next"
* type page: instance count should not be able to be set to 0, min is 1 (also, validation when i clicked next did not catch this error)
* type page: update description to match wireframe please
* security page: rules not displaying for selected security group (be sure message for no rules displays as well if selected security group has no rules)
* please be sure CSS classes are added to wizard steps so that they can bve styled according to comps when the visual designer finishes those (we'll probably need them)
* BDM column header should be "Create from snapshot" and data there is missing snap size
* BDM Ephemeral choice should be "Ephemeral 0"
* BDM delete on terminate should not be available for the root volume
* BDM mapping does not default to next available mapping
* BDM size pre-filled at 2?
* BDM does not seem to be validating choices on add (or at least was not providing error messages on invalid input (vol size was smaller than chosen snap, and also i did not provide a mapping
* BDM irrelevant choices not hidden when ephemeral is chosen (please see notes in wireframe)
* BDM I can select ephemeral more than once (there's only 1 in euca)
*summary does not show advanced choices

good job so far, so close! A few things repeated from the last review cycle:

* needs filter widget like the landing page to filter the image list, instead of the pulldown.
* summary area still shows defaults before you have gotten to that step, this should not happen. The summary should only show stuff available on the steps you have seen (including the current step), please.
* details page: AZ selector still does not have "no preference" option (for euca only).
* Advanced: checkbox labels are still to the left of the widget, they should be to the right. I thought [~dkavanagh] fixed this universally? Can you fix this, please?
* There's no cancel. See https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Wizards+-+refreshed for mockup, please.

Can't verify BDM requests from last review cycle, there are no EBS images in our cloud to choose from. Can you add an EBS image to our cloud for the next review cycle so I can verify those, please?

Thanks!

[~jloza]:

A few questions/clarifications…
1. I'll probably need a wireframe for the filters in the image picker, since we're really constrained for space (especially if we want to handle a small screen view).

2. Do we need a "Cancel" link?  Just curious why we would need one here.  And if so, should it be in each step of the wizard?  And where should it go?  Just seems like a distraction, and it would cause some frustration if it was mistakenly clicked while going through the steps in the wizard.  Anyway, would be happy to discuss more OTP if you have some time.

Fixes that were relatively simple are in https://github.com/eucalyptus/koala/pull/169

Includes…
- Selective display of summary area
- Add a "No preference" option for the availability zone selector (Euca only)
- Left align checkboxes in step 4 of wizard

[~jloza]: I'm going to open a separate ticket for implementing filters for the image picker, since that spans the Launch Config wizard as well.
Let me know if you still want the "Cancel" button in the wizards (see my prior comments).  Maybe we can open a separate bug for that as well to move this one along?

[~jloza]: Could you comment on why we spec'd the "No preference" option for the AZ selector as Euca only?  
/cc [~dkavanagh]
[~kgill] sorry, it's not euca only. it's for both. My mistake.

hi [~kgill], filter set is already wireframed at https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Launch+instance+wizard+-+refreshed

Call me if you need to discuss it, please.

We should have a cancel link, it's in the wizard framework wireframe at https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Wizards+-+refreshed

* needs no pref for AZ for AWS and Euca, sorry about that, I thought it was euca only for some reason.

* created GUI-372 for cancel link.
* I think [~kgill]l created ticket for filters here (they will also be needed for launch config wizard too), not sure of ticket number, can you add it [~kgill] please?

Will verify the rest of the review comments when this comes back to me. Thanks
[~jloza]: Created GUI-379 for image picker filters.
Added "No preference" option for AZ in Euca and AWS in https://github.com/eucalyptus/koala/pull/174
Still needs correct filters implemented, that should be getting handled in a separate ticket, right [~kgill]?
[~jloza]: Yep, the filters for the image picker are tracked in GUI-379
